goal.ch:
本課程為二學分的選修課程。
目的為介紹地理資訊系統之基礎概念與科學。除理論之外，亦會透過地理資訊系統的實作，讓學生瞭解地理資訊系統應用於資料蒐集、分析、展示之完整流程。
goal.en: This is a two credits elective course aims to introduce the fundamental concept and science of geographical information system. In addition to basic theory, this class will also allow students to understand the application of geographical information system on data collection, analysis, visualization by hands-on practices.

outline.ch:
"本課程為二學分的選修課程。
目的為介紹地理資訊系統之基礎概念與科學。授課內容包括：地理資訊之基本原則、技術、分析、應用及實機操作。
主要授課大綱包括：
(1) 課程簡介
(2) 系統與科學
(3) GIS應用
(4) 地理表徵
(5) 地理資料的天性
(6) 地理參照
(7) 地理資訊軟體
(8) 地理資料模式
(9) 地理視覺化
重要時程(全程16週)
2023/9/15 課程啟動
2023/11/10 期中考
2023/1/5 期末報告
"
outline.en:
"This is a two credits elective course aims to introduce fundamental concept and science of geographic information system. Lecture contents include: Principles, Techniques, Analysis, Application, and Hands-on practices.
Primary lecture outline:
(1) Introduction
(2) System and Science
(3) The Application of GIS
(4) Representing Geography
(5) The Nature of Geographic Data
(6) Georeferencing
(7) GI System Software
(8) Geographic Data Modeling
(9) Geovisualization
Important Dates (16 weeks):
2023 Sep. 15 Class Start
2023 Nov. 10 Mid-term exam
2023 Jan. 5 Final presentation
"
